title: Avocado and melon salad
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons caster sugar', '2 teaspoons paprika', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon mustard powder', '3 tablespoons cider vinegar', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon Worcestershire sauce', '1 pinch cayenne pepper', '175ml vegetable oil', '125g rocket', '1/4 cantaloupe melon - peeled, seeded and cubed', '1 avocado - peeled, stone removed and cubed', '8 tablespoons toasted flaked almonds']
